nio/FirebaseInsert.description: The Firebase Insert block takes incoming signals and saves them to the Firebase database under the specified `collection`. If no `collection` is specified, each signal will be saved in the database under a uniquely generated key.

collection.title: Database Collection
collection.description: Object key for accessing elements in the database tree

userEmail.title: Authenticated User Email
userEmail.description: Authenticated user email set up in Firebase

userPassword.title: Authenticated User Password
userPassword.description: Authenticated user password set up in Firebase

nio/FirebaseRead.description: The Firebase Read block takes incoming signals and uses them to read from the Firebase database under the specified `collection`.

collection.title: Database Collection
collection.description: Object key for accessing elements in the database tree

userEmail.title: Authenticated User Email
userEmail.description: Authenticated user email set up in Firebase

userPassword.title: Authenticated User Password
userPassword.description: Authenticated user password set up in Firebase

nio/FirebaseStream.description: The Firebase Stream block listens for changes to the specified `collection` and outputs all changes as a signal

collection.title: Database Collection
collection.description: Object key for accessing elements in the database tree

userEmail.description: Authenticated user email set up in Firebase
